response.answer_text: In order to “write Sanskrit” you need to learn the Devanagari script, currently in use in India. I would suggest you to read Devanagari - Wikipedia and begin from there. You can also learn Devanagari via Memrise. Or YouTube it. After learning it, you can begin to learn Sanskrit. There are different online websites who offer free courses.
